Speech and Conversation, Science of, Taught in Bible.--Our education in regard to the science of conversation will be in every way improved if we make the word of God our study. This branch of education has been woefully neglected. Many receive diplomas from colleges who have not earned them by gaining an all-round education. Teachers and pupils are apt to skip the important matter of the education of speech. For want of training in this 


                                     -361- 

line students lose much. They go from school to be deficient all through their life experience. . . .
